00051 Matrix& Matrix::add(Matrix& outMatrix, double inScalar) const
00052 {
00053     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::add() invalid of empty matrix!");
00054     outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols);    
00055     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) outMatrix[i] = (*this)[i] + inScalar;
00056     return outMatrix;
00057 }
00058 
00062 Matrix& Matrix::add(Matrix& outMatrix, const Matrix& inMatrix) const
00063 {
00064     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::add() invalid or empty matrix!");
00065     PACC_AssertM(mRows == inMatrix.mRows && mCols == inMatrix.mCols, "Matrix::add() matrix mismatch!"); 
00066     outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols);    
00067     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) outMatrix[i] = (*this)[i] + inMatrix[i];
00068     return outMatrix;
00069 }

00073 void Matrix::computeBackSubLU(const vector<unsigned int>& inIndexes, Matrix& ioMatrix) const
00074 {
00075     unsigned int lII = UINT_MAX;
00076     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00077         double lSum = ioMatrix(inIndexes[i], 0);
00078         ioMatrix(inIndexes[i], 0) = ioMatrix(i, 0);
00079         if(lII != UINT_MAX) {
00080             for(unsigned int j = lII; j < i; ++j) lSum -= (*this)(i,j) * ioMatrix(j, 0);
00081         } else if(lSum != 0.0) lII = i;
00082         ioMatrix(i, 0) = lSum;
00083     }
00084     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00085         const unsigned int lR = mRows-i-1;
00086         double lSum = ioMatrix(lR,0);
00087         for(unsigned int j = lR+1; j < mCols; ++j) lSum -= (*this)(lR,j) * ioMatrix(j,0);
00088         ioMatrix(lR,0) = lSum / (*this)(lR,lR);
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00094 double Matrix::computeDeterminant(void) const
00095 {
00096     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::computeDeterminant() invalid or empty matrix!");
00097     PACC_AssertM(mRows == mCols, "Matrix::computeDeterminant() matrix not square!");
00098     Matrix lTmp = *this;
00099     vector<unsigned int> lIndexes(mRows);
00100     int lD;
00101     lTmp.decomposeLU(lIndexes, lD);
00102     double lResult = lD;
00103     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) lResult *= lTmp(i,i);
00104     return lResult;
00105 }
00106 
00109 void Matrix::computeEigens(Vector& outValues, Matrix& outVectors) const
00110 {
00111     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::computeEigens() invalid or empty matrix!");
00112     PACC_AssertM(mRows == mCols, "Matrix::computeEigens() matrix not square!");
00113     outValues.resize(mRows);
00114     outVectors.resize(mRows, mCols);
00115     
00116     // Computer eigenvectors/eigenvalues using Triagonal QL method
00117     Vector lE(mRows);
00118     tred2(outValues, lE, outVectors);
00119     tql2(outValues, lE, outVectors);
00120     
00121     // Sort by eigenvalues.
00122     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < outValues.size(); ++j) {
00123         double lMax=outValues[j];
00124         unsigned int lMaxArg=j;
00125         for(unsigned int l = j+1; l<outValues.size(); ++l) {
00126             if(outValues[l] > lMax) {
00127                 lMax=outValues[l];
00128                 lMaxArg=l;
00129             }
00130         }
00131         if(lMaxArg != j) {
00132             for(unsigned int r = 0; r < outVectors.mRows; ++r) {
00133                 double lTmp = outVectors(r,j);
00134                 outVectors(r,j) = outVectors(r,lMaxArg);
00135                 outVectors(r,lMaxArg) = lTmp;
00136             }
00137             double lTmp = outValues[j];
00138             outValues[j] = outValues[lMaxArg];
00139             outValues[lMaxArg] = lTmp;
00140         }
00141     }
00142 }
00143 
00146 void Matrix::decomposeLU(vector<unsigned int>& outIndexes, int& outD)
00147 {
00148     outD = 1;
00149     vector<double> lScales;
00150     scaleLU(lScales);
00151     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00152         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < j; ++i) {
00153             double lSum = (*this)(i, j);
00154             for(unsigned int k = 0; k < i; ++k) lSum -= (*this)(i,k) * (*this)(k,j);
00155             (*this)(i, j) = lSum;
00156         }
00157         double lMax = 0;
00158         unsigned int l = j;
00159         for(unsigned int i = j; i < mRows; ++i) {
00160             double lSum = (*this)(i,j);
00161             for(unsigned int k = 0; k < j; ++k) lSum -= (*this)(i,k) * (*this)(k,j);
00162             (*this)(i, j) = lSum;
00163             double lTmp = lScales[i] * fabs(lSum);
00164             if(lTmp >= lMax) {
00165                 l = i;
00166                 lMax = lTmp;
00167             }
00168         }
00169         if(j != l) {
00170             for(unsigned int k = 0; k < (*this).mCols; ++k) {
00171                 double lTmp = (*this)(l,k);
00172                 (*this)(l,k) = (*this)(j,k);
00173                 (*this)(j,k) = lTmp;
00174             }
00175             outD = -outD;
00176             lScales[l] = lScales[j];
00177         }
00178         outIndexes[j] = l;
00179         if((*this)(j,j) == 0.0) (*this)(j,j) = 1e-20;
00180         if(j != (mCols-1)) {
00181             double lDummy = 1.0 / (*this)(j,j);
00182             for(unsigned int i = j+1; i < mRows; ++i) (*this)(i,j) *= lDummy;
00183         }
00184     }
00185 }

00190 Matrix& Matrix::concatenateColumns(Matrix& outMatrix, const Matrix& inMatrix) const
00191 {
00192     PACC_AssertM(mRows == inMatrix.mRows, "Matrix::concatenateColumns() matrix mismatch!"); 
00193     if(&outMatrix != this) {
00194         // output matrix is not self assigning
00195         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols+inMatrix.mCols);
00196         // copy this matrix to output matrix
00197         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00198             for(unsigned int j = 0; j <= mCols; ++j) {
00199                 outMatrix(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
00200             }
00201         }
00202     } else {
00203         // resize the output (this) matrix
00204         outMatrix.resize(mRows, mCols+inMatrix.mCols);
00205     }
00206     // concatenate input matrix to output matrix
00207     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00208         for(unsigned int j = 0; j <= inMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00209             outMatrix(i,j+mCols) = inMatrix(i,j);
00210         }
00211     }
00212     return outMatrix;
00213 }
00214 
00218 Matrix& Matrix::concatenateRows(Matrix& outMatrix, const Matrix& inMatrix) const
00219 {
00220     PACC_AssertM(mRows == inMatrix.mRows, "Matrix::concatenateRows() matrix mismatch!");    
00221     if(&outMatrix != this) {
00222         // output matrix is not self assigning
00223         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows+inMatrix.mRows, mCols);
00224         // copy this matrix to output matrix
00225         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00226             for(unsigned int j = 0; j <= mCols; ++j) {
00227                 outMatrix(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
00228             }
00229         }
00230     } else {
00231         // resize the output (this) matrix
00232         outMatrix.resize(mRows+inMatrix.mRows, mCols);
00233     }
00234     // concatenate input matrix to output matrix
00235     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00236         for(unsigned int j = 0; j <= inMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00237             outMatrix(i+mRows,j) = inMatrix(i,j);
00238         }
00239     }
00240     return outMatrix;
00241 }

00246 Matrix& Matrix::extract(Matrix& outMatrix, unsigned int inRow1, unsigned int inRow2, unsigned int inCol1, unsigned int inCol2) const
00247 {
00248     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::extract() invalid or empty matrix!");
00249     PACC_AssertM(inRow1 <= inRow2 && inCol1 <= inCol2 && inRow2 < mRows && inCol2 < mCols, "Matrix::extract() invalid indexes!");
00250     if(&outMatrix != this) {
00251         // output matrix is not self assigning
00252         outMatrix.setRowsCols(inRow2-inRow1+1, inCol2-inCol1+1);
00253         for(unsigned int i = inRow1; i <= inRow2; ++i) {
00254             for(unsigned int j = inCol1; j <= inCol2; ++j) {
00255                 outMatrix(i-inRow1,j-inCol1) = (*this)(i,j);
00256             }
00257         }
00258     } else {
00259         // use temporary matrix to self assign
00260         Matrix lMatrix(*this);
00261         outMatrix.setRowsCols(inRow2-inRow1+1, inCol2-inCol1+1);
00262         for(unsigned int i = inRow1; i <= inRow2; ++i) {
00263             for(unsigned int j = inCol1; j <= inCol2; ++j) {
00264                 outMatrix(i-inRow1,j-inCol1) = lMatrix(i,j);
00265             }
00266         }
00267     }
00268     return outMatrix;
00269 }

00305 double Matrix::hypot(double a, double b) const
00306 {
00307     double r;
00308     if(abs(a) > abs(b)) {
00309         r = b/a;
00310         r = abs(a)*sqrt(1+r*r);
00311     }
00312     else if(b != 0) {
00313         r = a/b;
00314         r = abs(b)*sqrt(1+r*r);
00315     }
00316     else {
00317         r = 0.0;
00318     }
00319     return r;
00320 }

00325 {
00326     Matrix lMatrix; 
00327     return invert(lMatrix);

00329 
00333 Matrix& Matrix::invert(Matrix& outMatrix) const
00334 {
00335     PACC_AssertM(mRows == mCols, "Matrix::invert() matrix not square!");
00336     Matrix lTmp = *this;
00337     vector<unsigned int> lIndexes(mRows);
00338     int lD;
00339     lTmp.decomposeLU(lIndexes, lD);
00340     outMatrix.setIdentity(mRows);
00341     Matrix lB(mRows, 1);
00342     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00343         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) lB(i,0) = outMatrix(i,j);
00344         lTmp.computeBackSubLU(lIndexes, lB);
00345         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) outMatrix(i,j) = lB(i,0);
00346     }
00347     return outMatrix;
00348 }

00353 Matrix& Matrix::maxColumns(Matrix& outMatrix) const
00354 {
00355     extractRow(outMatrix, 0);
00356     for(unsigned int i = 1; i < getRows(); ++i) {
00357         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < getCols(); ++j) {
00358             if(outMatrix(0, j) < (*this)(i,j)) outMatrix(0,j) = (*this)(i,j);
00359         }
00360     }
00361     return outMatrix;
00362 }

00371         for(unsigned int j = 1; j < getCols(); ++j) {
00372             if(outMatrix(i, 0) < (*this)(i,j)) outMatrix(i, 0) = (*this)(i,j);
00373         }
00374     }
00375     return outMatrix;

00409 Matrix& Matrix::multiply(Matrix& outMatrix, double inScalar) const
00410 {
00411     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::multiply() invalid or empty matrix!");
00412     outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols);
00413     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) outMatrix[i] = (*this)[i] * inScalar;
00414     return outMatrix;
00415 }
00416 
00420 Matrix& Matrix::multiply(Matrix& outMatrix, const Matrix& inMatrix) const
00421 {
00422     PACC_AssertM(mCols == inMatrix.mRows, "Matrix::multiply() matrix mismatch!");
00423     if(&outMatrix != this && &outMatrix != &inMatrix) {
00424         // output matrix is neither left or right matrix (no self assigment)
00425         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, inMatrix.mCols);
00426         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < outMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00427             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < outMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00428                 outMatrix(i,j) = 0;
00429                 for(unsigned int k = 0; k < mCols; ++k) {
00430                     outMatrix(i,j) += (*this)(i,k) * inMatrix(k,j);
00431                 }
00432             }
00433         }
00434     } else if(&outMatrix == this && &outMatrix != &inMatrix) {
00435         // use temporary matrix to self assign with left matrix
00436         Matrix lMatrix(*this);
00437         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, inMatrix.mCols);
00438         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < outMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00439             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < outMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00440                 outMatrix(i,j) = 0;
00441                 for(unsigned int k = 0; k < mCols; ++k) {
00442                     outMatrix(i,j) += lMatrix(i,k) * inMatrix(k,j);
00443                 }
00444             }
00445         }
00446     } else if(&outMatrix != this && &outMatrix == &inMatrix) {
00447         // use temporary matrix to self assign with right matrix
00448         Matrix lMatrix(inMatrix);
00449         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, inMatrix.mCols);
00450         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < outMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00451             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < outMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00452                 outMatrix(i,j) = 0;
00453                 for(unsigned int k = 0; k < mCols; ++k) {
00454                     outMatrix(i,j) += (*this)(i,k) * lMatrix(k,j);
00455                 }
00456             }
00457         }
00458     } else {
00459         // use temporary matrix to self assign with both left and right matrices
00460         Matrix lMatrix(*this);
00461         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, inMatrix.mCols);
00462         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < outMatrix.mRows; ++i) {
00463             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < outMatrix.mCols; ++j) {
00464                 outMatrix(i,j) = 0;
00465                 for(unsigned int k = 0; k < mCols; ++k) {
00466                     outMatrix(i,j) += lMatrix(i,k) * lMatrix(k,j);
00467                 }
00468             }
00469         }
00470     }
00471     return outMatrix;
00472 }
00473 
00480 void Matrix::parse(const string& inString)
00481 {
00482     clear();
00483     mRows = mCols = 0;
00484     istringstream lStream(inString);
00485     Tokenizer lTokenizer(lStream);
00486     lTokenizer.setDelimiters(" \n\r\t,", ";");
00487     string lToken;
00488     unsigned int lColumn = 0;
00489     bool lFinished = false;
00490     while(!lFinished) {
00491         if(!lTokenizer.getNextToken(lToken)) {
00492             lFinished = true;
00493             lToken = ";";
00494         }
00495         if(lToken == ";") {
00496             // either end of string or end of row
00497             if(lColumn > 0 && mCols == 0) {
00498                 // this token marks the end of the first row
00499                 mCols = lColumn;
00500                 ++mRows;
00501             } else if(lColumn > 0 && lColumn == mCols) {
00502                 // the current row is valid
00503                 ++mRows;
00504             } else if(lColumn != mCols) {
00505                 // rows don't have the same number of columns
00506                 XML::Node lNode(inString, XML::eString);
00507                 throwError("Matrix::parse() invalid format, variable number of columns!", &lNode);
00508             }
00509             lColumn = 0;
00510         } else {
00511             push_back(String::convertToFloat(lToken));
00512             ++lColumn;
00513         }
00514     }
00515 }
00516 
00543 string Matrix::read(const XML::ConstIterator& inNode)
00544 {
00545     if(!inNode) throw runtime_error("Matrix::read() nothing to read!");
00546     if(inNode->getType() == XML::eData) {
00547         // read first format
00548         bool lStringParsed = false;
00549         for(XML::ConstIterator lChild = inNode->getFirstChild(); lChild; ++lChild) {
00550             if(lChild->getType() == XML::eString) {
00551                 if(lStringParsed) 
00552                     throwError("Matrix::read() invalid format, matrix contains multiple strings!", inNode);
00553                 parse(lChild->getValue());
00554                 lStringParsed = true;
00555             }
00556         }
00557         if(inNode->isDefined("rows")) {
00558             // validate number of rows
00559             int lRows = String::convertToInteger(inNode->getAttribute("rows"));
00560             if((int)mRows != lRows) throwError("Matrix::read() invalid 'rows' attribute!", inNode);
00561         }
00562         if(inNode->isDefined("cols")) {
00563             // validate number of cols
00564             int lCols = String::convertToInteger(inNode->getAttribute("cols"));
00565             if((int)mCols != lCols) throwError("Matrix::read() invalid 'cols' attribute!", inNode);
00566         }
00567     } else if(inNode->getType() == XML::eString) {
00568         // read second format
00569         parse(inNode->getValue());
00570     } else {
00571         // unsupported node type
00572         throwError("Matrix::read() node type must be XML::eData or XML::eString!", inNode);
00573     }
00574     if(inNode->isDefined("name")) mName = inNode->getAttribute("name");
00575     return mName;
00576 }
00577 
00580 void Matrix::resize(unsigned int inRows, unsigned int inCols)
00581 {
00582     Matrix lMat(*this);
00583     setRowsCols(inRows, inCols);
00584     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00585         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00586             (*this)(i,j) = (i < lMat.mRows && j < lMat.mCols ? lMat(i,j) : 0.);
00587         }
00588     }
00589 }
00590 
00593 void Matrix::scaleLU(vector<double>& outScales) const
00594 {
00595     outScales.resize(mCols);
00596     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00597         double lMax = 0.;
00598         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00599             const double lTmp = fabs((*this)(i,j));     
00600             if(lTmp > lMax) lMax=lTmp;
00601         }
00602         if(lMax == 0.) throw runtime_error("<Matrix::scaleLU> matrix is singular!");
00603         outScales[i] = 1./lMax;
00604     }
00605 }
00606 
00617 string Matrix::serialize(void) const
00618 {
00619     ostringstream lContent;
00620     lContent.precision(mPrec);
00621     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
00622         if(i != 0 && i % mCols == 0) lContent << ";";
00623         else if(i != 0) lContent << ",";
00624         lContent << (*this)[i];
00625     }
00626     return lContent.str();
00627 }
00628 
00631 void Matrix::setIdentity(unsigned int inSize)
00632 {
00633     setRowsCols(inSize, inSize);
00634     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00635         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00636             (*this)(i,j) = (i == j ? 1 : 0);
00637         }
00638     }
00639 }

00644 Matrix& Matrix::subtract(Matrix& outMatrix, double inScalar) const
00645 {
00646     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::subtract() invalid or empty matrix!");
00647     outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols);
00648     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) outMatrix[i] = (*this)[i] - inScalar;
00649     return outMatrix;
00650 }
00651 
00655 Matrix& Matrix::subtract(Matrix& outMatrix, const Matrix& inMatrix) const
00656 {
00657     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::subtract() invalid or empty matrix!");
00658     PACC_AssertM(mRows == inMatrix.mRows && mCols == inMatrix.mCols, "Matrix::subtract() matrix mismatch!");
00659     outMatrix.setRowsCols(mRows, mCols);
00660     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) outMatrix[i] = (*this)[i] - inMatrix[i];
00661     return outMatrix;
00662 }
00663 
00667 Matrix& Matrix::sumAbsColumns(Matrix& outMatrix) const
00668 {
00669     outMatrix = Matrix(1, getCols(), 0);
00670     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < getRows(); ++i) {
00671         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < getCols(); ++j) {
00672             outMatrix(0, j) += fabs((*this)(i,j));
00673         }
00674     }
00675     return outMatrix;
00676 }

00686             outMatrix(i, 0) += fabs((*this)(i,j));
00687         }
00688     }

00747 
00759 void Matrix::tql2(Vector& d, Vector& e, Matrix& V) const
00760 {
00761     const unsigned int n=mRows;
00762     for(unsigned int i = 1; i < n; i++) e[i-1] = e[i];
00763     e[n-1] = 0.0;
00764     
00765     double f = 0.0;
00766     double tst1 = 0.0;
00767     double eps = std::pow(2.0,-52.0);
00768     for(unsigned int l = 0; l < n; l++) {
00769         // Find small subdiagonal element
00770         tst1 = max(tst1, abs(d[l]) + abs(e[l]));
00771         unsigned int m=l;
00772         while((m+1) < n) {
00773             if(std::abs(e[m]) <= eps*tst1) break;
00774             m++;
00775         }
00776         
00777         // If m == l, d[l] is an eigenvalue,
00778         // otherwise, iterate.
00779         if(m > l) {
00780             unsigned int iter = 0;
00781             do {
00782                 iter = iter + 1;  // (Could check iteration count here.)
00783                                                     // Compute implicit shift
00784                 double g = d[l];
00785                 double p = (d[l+1] - g) / (2.0 * e[l]);
00786                 double r = hypot(p,1.0);
00787                 if(p < 0) r = -r;
00788                 d[l] = e[l] / (p + r);
00789                 d[l+1] = e[l] * (p + r);
00790                 double dl1 = d[l+1];
00791                 double h = g - d[l];
00792                 for(unsigned int i = l+2; i < n; i++) d[i] -= h;
00793                 f = f + h;
00794                 
00795                 // Implicit QL transformation.
00796                 p = d[m];
00797                 double c = 1.0;
00798                 double c2 = c;
00799                 double c3 = c;
00800                 double el1 = e[l+1];
00801                 double s = 0.0;
00802                 double s2 = 0.0;
00803                 for(unsigned int i = m-1; i >= l; i--) {
00804                     c3 = c2;
00805                     c2 = c;
00806                     s2 = s;
00807                     g = c * e[i];
00808                     h = c * p;
00809                     r = hypot(p,e[i]);
00810                     e[i+1] = s * r;
00811                     s = e[i] / r;
00812                     c = p / r;
00813                     p = c * d[i] - s * g;
00814                     d[i+1] = h + s * (c * g + s * d[i]);
00815                     
00816                     // Accumulate transformation.
00817                     for(unsigned int k = 0; k < n; k++) {
00818                         h = V(k,i+1);
00819                         V(k,i+1) = s * V(k,i) + c * h;
00820                         V(k,i) = c * V(k,i) - s * h;
00821                     }
00822                     if(i == 0) break;
00823                 }
00824                 p = -s * s2 * c3 * el1 * e[l] / dl1;
00825                 e[l] = s * p;
00826                 d[l] = c * p;
00827                 
00828                 // Check for convergence.
00829             } while (std::abs(e[l]) > eps*tst1);
00830         }
00831         d[l] = d[l] + f;
00832         e[l] = 0.0;
00833     }
00834 }
00835 
00847 void Matrix::tred2(Vector& d, Vector& e, Matrix& V) const
00848 {
00849     const unsigned int n=mRows;
00850     V = *this;
00851     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < n; ++j) d[j] = V(n-1,j);
00852     
00853     // Householder reduction to tridiagonal form.
00854     for(unsigned int i = n-1; i > 0; --i) {
00855         
00856         // Scale to avoid under/overflow.
00857         double scale = 0.0;
00858         double h = 0.0;
00859         for(unsigned int k = 0; k < i; ++k) scale += abs(d[k]);
00860         if(scale == 0.0) {
00861             e[i] = d[i-1];
00862             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
00863                 d[j] = V(i-1,j);
00864                 V(i,j) = 0.0;
00865                 V(j,i) = 0.0;
00866             }
00867         } else {
00868             // Generate Householder vector.
00869             for(unsigned int k=0; k<i; ++k) {
00870                 d[k] /= scale;
00871                 h += d[k] * d[k];
00872             }
00873             double f = d[i-1];
00874             double g = sqrt(h);
00875             if(f > 0.0) g = -g;
00876             e[i] = scale * g;
00877             h = h - f * g;
00878             d[i-1] = f - g;
00879             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < i; j++) e[j] = 0.0;
00880             
00881             // Apply similarity transformation to remaining columns.
00882             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00883                 f = d[j];
00884                 V(j,i) = f;
00885                 g = e[j] + V(j,j) * f;
00886                 for(unsigned int k = j+1; k <= i-1; k++) {
00887                     g += V(k,j) * d[k];
00888                     e[k] += V(k,j) * f;
00889                 }
00890                 e[j] = g;
00891             }
00892             f = 0.0;
00893             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00894                 e[j] /= h;
00895                 f += e[j] * d[j];
00896             }
00897             double hh = f / (h + h);
00898             for(unsigned int j=0; j<i; j++) e[j] -= hh * d[j];
00899             for(unsigned int j=0; j<i; j++) {
00900                 f = d[j];
00901                 g = e[j];
00902                 for(unsigned int k = j; k <= i-1; k++) V(k,j) -= (f * e[k] + g * d[k]);
00903                 d[j] = V(i-1,j);
00904                 V(i,j) = 0.0;
00905             }
00906         }
00907         d[i] = h;
00908     }
00909     
00910     // Accumulate transformations.
00911     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n-1; i++) {
00912         V(n-1,i) = V(i,i);
00913         V(i,i) = 1.0;
00914         double h = d[i+1];
00915         if(h!=0.0) {
00916             for(unsigned int k=0; k<=i; k++) d[k] = V(k,i+1) / h;
00917             for(unsigned int j=0; j<=i; j++) {
00918                 double g = 0.0;
00919                 for(unsigned int k=0; k<=i; k++) g += V(k,i+1) * V(k,j);
00920                 for(unsigned int k=0; k<=i; k++) V(k,j) -= g * d[k];
00921             }
00922         }
00923         for(unsigned int k=0; k<=i; k++) V(k,i+1) = 0.0;
00924     }
00925     for(unsigned int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00926         d[j] = V(n-1,j);
00927         V(n-1,j) = 0.0;
00928     }
00929     V(n-1,n-1) = 1.0;
00930     e[0] = 0.0;
00931 }
00932 
00935 Matrix Matrix::transpose(void) const 
00936 {
00937     Matrix lMatrix; 
00938     return transpose(lMatrix);
00939 }
00940 
00944 Matrix& Matrix::transpose(Matrix& outMatrix) const
00945 {
00946     PACC_AssertM(mRows > 0 && mCols > 0, "Matrix::transpose() invalid or empty matrix!");
00947     if(&outMatrix != this) {
00948         // output matrix is not self assigning
00949         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mCols,mRows);
00950         // transpose elements
00951         for(unsigned int i = 0; i< mRows; ++i) {
00952             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00953                 outMatrix(j,i) = (*this)(i,j);
00954             }
00955         }
00956     } else {
00957         // use temporary matrix to self assign
00958         Matrix lMatrix(*this);
00959         outMatrix.setRowsCols(mCols,mRows);
00960         // transpose elements
00961         for(unsigned int i = 0; i< mRows; ++i) {
00962             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < mCols; ++j) {
00963                 outMatrix(j,i) = lMatrix(i,j);
00964             }
00965         }
00966     }       
00967     return outMatrix;
00968 }
00969 
00972 void Matrix::throwError(const string& inMessage, const XML::ConstIterator& inNode) const
00973 {
00974     ostringstream lStream;
00975     lStream << inMessage << " for markup:\n";
00976     XML::Streamer lStreamer(lStream);
00977     if(inNode) inNode->serialize(lStreamer);
00978     throw runtime_error(lStream.str());
00979 }
00980 
00989 void Matrix::write(XML::Streamer& outStream, const string& inTag) const
00990 {
00991     outStream.openTag(inTag, false);
00992     if(mName != "") outStream.insertAttribute("name", mName);
00993     outStream.insertAttribute("rows", mRows);
00994     outStream.insertAttribute("cols", mCols);
00995     outStream.insertStringContent(serialize());
00996     outStream.closeTag();
00997 }
00998 
01001 ostream& PACC::operator<<(ostream &outStream, const Matrix& inMatrix)
01002 {
01003     XML::Streamer lStream(outStream);
01004     inMatrix.write(lStream);
01005     return outStream;
01006 }
01007 
01012 XML::Document& PACC::operator>>(XML::Document& inDocument, Matrix& outMatrix)
01013 {
01014     XML::Iterator lNode = inDocument.getFirstDataTag();
01015     outMatrix.read(lNode);
01016     inDocument.erase(lNode);
01017     return inDocument;
01018 }
